statements: DELETE FROM interactions WHERE interaction_id = 1 AND customer_id = 100
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' AND interaction_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM Calls WHERE customer_id=123 AND call_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM Emails WHERE customer_id=456 AND subject LIKE '%urgent%';
DELETE FROM Calls WHERE duration_minutes > 60 OR (customer_id=789 AND call_date < '2020-06-01');
DELETE FROM calls WHERE call_id = 12345 AND customer_id = 67890;
DELETE FROM emails WHERE email_id = 54321 AND customer_id = 98765;
DELETE FROM meetings WHERE meeting_id = 98765 AND customer_id = 54321;
DELETE FROM Emails WHERE email_id IN (SELECT email_id FROM Customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM Meetings WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%');
DELETE FROM calls WHERE customer_id = 1 AND call_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM emails WHERE email_id IN (SELECT email_id FROM emails WHERE customer_id = 2);
